title: Eligibility Verification Controller
description:
Implement Eligibility Verification Controller with Request Management and Status Tracking

Create a comprehensive controller to handle eligibility verification requests and provide real-time status tracking capabilities for healthcare provider eligibility checks.

Requirements:
- Design and implement REST API endpoints for eligibility verification operations:
  - POST endpoint to submit new eligibility verification requests
  - GET endpoint to retrieve verification status by request ID
  - GET endpoint to list verification requests with filtering (by status, date range, provider)
  - PUT/PATCH endpoint to update verification request details if applicable

- Request handling:
  - Validate incoming request payloads (patient info, insurance details, provider data)
  - Generate unique tracking IDs for each verification request
  - Handle synchronous and asynchronous verification flows
  - Implement proper error handling with meaningful status codes and messages

- Status tracking system:
  - Define clear status states (e.g., pending, in_progress, completed, failed, expired)
  - Store verification request data with timestamps and audit trail
  - Update status as verification progresses through workflow stages
  - Support status change notifications/webhooks if applicable

- Data management:
  - Persist verification requests and responses to database
  - Structure response format with verification results and coverage details
  - Implement pagination for list endpoints
  - Add indexing for efficient status queries

- Security and validation:
  - Authenticate and authorize API requests
  - Sanitize and validate all input data
  - Ensure HIPAA compliance for PHI handling
  - Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse

- Testing considerations:
  - Unit tests for controller methods
  - Integration tests for API endpoints
  - Test various eligibility scenarios (active coverage, expired, not found)
  - Validate error handling paths
